In the past six years, she’s transitioned from editorial writing for lifestyle publications to producing international news packages and developing content strategy roadmaps for multiple projects.In her previous role as senior content strategist at Seedly, she looked after its SEO efforts, moderated personal finance events, and spoke on Money.FM, a Singapore-based radio channel.Her works have been published in Time Out Singapore, Rice Media, Tech in Asia, South China Morning Post, MarinaBaySands.com, and ChannelNewsAsia.com. 12 Best SEO Podcasts in 2024 Rebecca Liew September 6, 2023 Ahrefs’ Twitter Marketing Strategy: Here’s How We Do It Rebecca Liew October 7, 2022 10 Types of Blog Posts & How to Use Them Effectively Rebecca Liew April 27, 2022 13 Best Marketing Blogs to Follow (For Marketers of All Levels) Rebecca Liew March 17, 2022 12 Best Marketing Podcasts in 2024 Rebecca Liew February 9, 2022 10 Best Digital Marketing Facebook Groups Rebecca Liew January 26, 2022 How to Write a Press Release (+ Free Template) Rebecca Liew January 12, 2022 17 Free Online Marketing Courses to Learn Digital Marketing Rebecca Liew November 10, 2021 10 Best Job Boards for Marketers (+ Bonus Suggestions) Rebecca Liew October 14, 2021 7 Best Online Marketing Communities (Free and Paid) to Join Rebecca Liew September 30, 2021 12 Search English DeutschEspañolFrançaisItalianoPortuguês中文 EnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItalianoPortuguês中文 © 2024 Ahrefs Pte Ltd.Pick a topic SEO General SEO Keyword Research On-Page SEO Link Building Technical SEO Local SEO Enterprise SEO Marketing General Marketing Content Marketing Affiliate Marketing Paid Marketing Video Marketing Data & Studies Product Ahrefs Tools Core Tools Site Explorer Keywords Explorer Content Explorer Site Audit Rank Tracker Free Tools Backlink Checker Website Authority Checker Keyword Rank Checker Broken Link Checker SERP Checker Close Join the Ahrefs' DigestGet the week's best marketing content in your inbox.
